author: vwbaker
message:
Turn off autotuning for LargeDynamicInput test

This is unnecessary for this test and causes `RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED: Failed to allocate request for 95.38GiB (102416777216B) on device ordinal 0` when run with `--xla_gpu_experimental_enable_fusion_autotuner`.

sponge: http://sponge2/d40287cf-1b38-4a28-ae53-e13d27d88cb5
